question, what does sudo mean?
It's a command to run things as root
man sudo for more
Specifically, telling it to do something as root.
another newb question.... root means?
If you type "foo" at the command line, it runs the program foo. If you type "sudo foo", it runs the command foo as if root were the one running it.
The root account is the all-powerful, administrative account.
